info.name: Doqett Compliance API
info.description: API collection for testing Doqett Compliance GRC platform endpoints

item.name: Authentication

body.raw:
{
    "email": "admin@example.com",
    "password": "password123",
    "firstName": "Admin",
    "lastName": "User",
    "roles": ["admin"]
}

request.description: Register a new user in the system
Login to obtain auth token. This automatically saves the token to the environment variable.
Get information about the currently logged in user

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, and session management

item.name: Compliance - Frameworks

request.description: List all compliance frameworks with optional filters
Get a specific framework by ID, with the option to include implementation statistics

body.raw:
{
    "name": "SOC 2",
    "version": "2023",
    "description": "System and Organization Controls for Service Organizations",
    "organization": "AICPA",
    "category": "security",
    "website": "https://www.aicpa.org",
    "isActive": true
}

request.description: Create a new compliance framework

item.description: Endpoints for managing compliance frameworks (e.g., SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA)

item.name: Compliance - Controls

request.description: List all controls with optional filters
Get a specific control by ID, with the option to include related controls

body.raw:
{
    "frameworkId": "{{frameworkId}}",
    "code": "CC5.1",
    "title": "COSO - Control Activities",
    "description": "The entity selects and develops control activities that contribute to the mitigation of risks to the achievement of objectives to acceptable levels.",
    "guidance": "Implement controls to ensure appropriate access, change management, and secure development processes.",
    "implementationStatus": "not_implemented",
    "categories": ["control_activities", "risk_management"],
    "isActive": true
}

request.description: Create a new control within a framework
Update the implementation status and details of a control

item.description: Endpoints for managing controls within compliance frameworks

item.name: Compliance - Evidence

request.description: List all evidence with optional filters
Get a specific evidence by ID, with the option to include related controls

formdata.value: Official password policy document approved by the security team

request.description: Upload a new evidence file for one or more controls
Review and approve/reject an evidence submission
Link an existing evidence to an additional control

item.description: Endpoints for managing evidence for compliance controls

request.description: List all policies with optional filters
Get a specific policy by ID, with the option to include related controls

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Password Policy",
    "type": "security",
    "description": "Policy defining password requirements and management",
    "content": "# Password Policy

## Purpose
This policy establishes the requirements for secure passwords...

## Requirements
1. Passwords must be at least 12 characters long
2. Passwords must include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
3. Passwords must be changed every 90 days
...",
    "owner": "{{userId}}",
    "relatedControlIds": ["{{controlId}}"],
    "tags": ["security", "password", "authentication"]
}

request.description: Create a new policy document
Approve a policy that is in draft or review status
Publish an approved policy, making it effective

item.name: Risk Management

request.description: List all risks with optional filters
Get a specific risk by ID, with options to include related controls and treatment plans

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Weak Password Controls",
    "description": "Risk of unauthorized access due to weak password policies",
    "category": "security",
    "inherentImpact": "major",
    "inherentLikelihood": "likely",
    "residualImpact": "moderate",
    "residualLikelihood": "possible",
    "owner": {
        "id": "{{userId}}",
        "name": "John Smith",
        "department": "Information Security"
    },
    "relatedControlIds": ["{{controlId}}"],
    "reviewPeriodMonths": 3,
    "tags": ["password", "access control", "authentication"]
}

request.description: Create a new risk assessment

body.raw:
{
    "riskId": "{{riskId}}",
    "name": "Implement Strong Password Policy",
    "description": "Implement and enforce stronger password requirements including minimum length, complexity, and regular rotation",
    "type": "mitigate",
    "status": "planned",
    "dueDate": "2023-08-31T00:00:00.000Z",
    "assignee": "{{userId}}",
    "relatedControlIds": ["{{controlId}}"]
}

request.description: Create a new risk treatment plan

item.description: Endpoints for managing risks and risk treatments

item.name: Reporting & Dashboard

request.description: List all reports with optional filters
Get a specific report by ID
Create a new report definition, optionally with scheduling
Generate a report on demand
List all dashboards with optional filters
Get a specific dashboard by ID
Create a new dashboard
List all metrics with optional filters
Get a specific metric by ID
Create a new metric definition
Calculate a metric on demand

item.description: Endpoints for reports, dashboards, and metrics

item.name: Audit Management

request.description: List all audits with optional filters
Get a specific audit by ID, with the option to include findings
Create a new audit
Update the status of an audit
List all findings with optional filters
Get a specific finding by ID

body.raw:
{
    "auditId": "{{auditId}}",
    "title": "Weak Password Policy Implementation",
    "description": "Password policy does not enforce minimum length and complexity requirements.",
    "type": "nonconformity",
    "severity": "high",
    "controlIds": ["{{controlId}}"],
    "evidenceIds": ["{{evidenceId}}"],
    "dueDate": "2023-07-31T00:00:00.000Z",
    "remediationPlan": {
        "description": "Update and implement password policy to enforce minimum 12 character length and complexity requirements.",
        "dueDate": "2023-07-15T00:00:00.000Z",
        "assignee": "{{userId}}"
    }
}

request.description: Create a new audit finding
Update the status of an audit finding
Add a remediation plan to a finding
Update an existing remediation plan

item.description: Endpoints for managing audits and audit findings

request.description: List all audit templates with optional filters
Get a specific audit template by ID
Create a new audit template
Create a new audit using an existing template

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Production Web Server",
    "type": "server",
    "description": "Primary web server for production environment",
    "status": "active",
    "riskLevel": "high",
    "location": "US East Data Center",
    "ipAddress": "10.0.0.1",
    "macAddress": "00:1A:2B:3C:4D:5E",
    "serialNumber": "SRV-2023-001",
    "purchaseDate": "2023-01-15T00:00:00.000Z",
    "endOfLifeDate": "2028-01-15T00:00:00.000Z",
    "tags": ["production", "web-tier", "critical"],
    "metadata": {
        "cpuCores": 16,
        "memoryGB": 64,
        "storageGB": 2000,
        "operatingSystem": "Ubuntu 22.04 LTS"
    },
    "owner": {
        "id": "user123",
        "name": "John Smith",
        "department": "IT Operations"
    }
}

request.description: Create a new asset
Get an asset by ID
List assets with filters
Assign a new owner to an asset
Update an asset's status
Update an asset's risk level
Link an asset to a compliance control
Update an asset's technical details
Get asset inventory statistics
Check if the server is running
